		"city": "Saanich",
		"province": "BC",

	},
	"contacts":[

			"firstName": "Jane",
			"lastName": "Doe",
			"phone1": "1234567890",

			"email": "jane@doe.com"
		},

		}
	],

	}
}

// assumes this is run after Add Status (with notes)
pm.test("Added note is first in list", function () {
// assumes this is run after Add Submission Note
// assumes this is run after Add Status Note
// assumes this is run after Add Status Note
